change.description: Consider replacing meteg on resh with merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: resh hiriq meteg yod qof sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: resh hiriq meteg yod qof sof-pasuq

notes.note: The line under the resh has sufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be a merkha, a conjunctive. However, the word ends with a sof pasuq making a meteg acting as a siluq far more probable as the intent of the scribe.
BHL has a meteg under the resh. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Consider replacing meteg on het with merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: mem sheva shin shin-dot hiriq yod het meteg vav holam sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: mem sheva shin shin-dot hiriq yod het meteg vav holam sof-pasuq

notes.note: The line under the het has sufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be a merkha, a conjunctive. However, the word ends with a sof pasuq making a meteg acting as a siluq far more probable as the intent of the scribe.
BHL has a meteg under the het. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Consider replacing meteg on shin with merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: resh holam alef shin shin-dot hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: resh holam alef shin shin-dot hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: The line under the shin has sufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be a merkha, a conjunctive. However, the word ends with a sof pasuq making a meteg acting as a siluq far more probable as the intent of the scribe.
BHL has a meteg under the shin. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change dehi on qof to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: qof dehi vav holam lamed hiriq yod
change.changeuni: qof tipeha vav holam lamed hiriq yod

notes.note: The curved mark under the qof is not very prepositive as required for a dehi.
BHL has a clearly prepositive dehi under the qof. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Consider replacing meteg under the lamed with merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: ayin qamats lamed qamats meteg yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: ayin qamats lamed qamats meteg yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: The line under the lamed has sufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be a merkha, a conjunctive. However, the word ends with a sof pasuq making a meteg acting as a siluq far more probable as the intent of the scribe.
BHL has a meteg under the lamed. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move meteg from below the mem to below the tsadi. Remove CGJ. Add note 't'
change.refuni: ayin hataf-patah tsadi qamats mem meteg combining-grapheme-joiner qamats yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: ayin hataf-patah tsadi qamats meteg mem qamats yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: The meteg is centered between the tsadi and the mem.
BHL has the meteg under the mem. BHL Appendix A has the meteg under the tsadi. The meteg follows the qamats.
The CGJ is no longer needed for positioning the meteg and has been removed.

change.description: Consider replacing meteg under the qof with merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh mem hiriq tav sheva nun patah qof dagesh tsere meteg final-mem sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: vav dagesh mem hiriq tav sheva nun patah qof dagesh tsere meteg final-mem sof-pasuq

notes.note: The line under the qof has sufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be a merkha, a conjunctive. However, the word ends with a sof pasuq making a meteg acting as a siluq far more probable as the intent of the scribe.
BHL has a meteg under the qof. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Replace merkha below the het with a meteg. Add transcription note 'm'.
change.refuni: alef qamats resh sheva het merkha vav holam tav
change.changeuni: alef qamats resh sheva het meteg vav holam tav

notes.note: The line under the het lacks the northeast-to-southwest inclination required for transcription as a merkha. The accent was probably intended to be a merkha. The spacing between this word and the next is very close.
BHL has a merkha under the het. The BHL has a meteg under the mem of the next word. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move the meteg from under the resh to under the shin. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva mem tsere yod shin shin-dot qamats resh meteg combining-grapheme-joiner hiriq yod final-mem sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva mem tsere yod shin shin-dot qamats meteg resh hiriq yod final-mem sof-pasuq

notes.note: The meteg is centered between the shin and the resh.
BHL has the meteg under the resh. BHL Appendix A has the meteg under the shin. The meteg follows the qamats.

change.description: Add dagesh to mem.
change.refuni: bet dagesh patah geresh-muqdam ayin hataf-patah tsadi vav dagesh mem qamats revia yod vav
change.changeuni: bet dagesh patah geresh-muqdam ayin hataf-patah tsadi vav dagesh mem dagesh qamats revia yod vav

notes.note: The dagesh is small and faint.
BHL has no dagesh in the mem. BHL Appendix A has a dagesh in the mem.

change.description: Remove dagesh in nun; remove sof pasuq. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: mem hiriq mem dagesh segol meteg nun dagesh hiriq yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: mem hiriq mem dagesh segol meteg nun hiriq yod

notes.note: The nun has no dagesh. This verse ends without a sof pasuq.
BHL has a dagesh in the nun and a sof pasuq at the end of the word. BHL Appendix A has no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove sheva under the yod.
change.refuni: yod sheva dehi he holam vav qamats he
change.changeuni: yod dehi he holam vav qamats he

notes.note: The sheva may have been erased.
BHL has a sheva on the yod. The sheva follows the dehi. BHL Appendix A has no sheva under the yod.

change.description: Move meteg from third bet to second bet.
change.refuni: bet dagesh hiriq lamed sheva bet qamats bet meteg vav holam sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: bet dagesh hiriq lamed sheva bet qamats meteg bet vav holam sof-pasuq

notes.note: BHL has the meteg under the third bet. BHL Appendix A has the meteg under the second bet.

change.description: Remove sheva under the bet; move merkha under the ayin to under the bet.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva bet dagesh sheva ayin merkha vav dagesh
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot sheva bet dagesh merkha ayin vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line under the bet has a very slight northeast-to-southwest inclination and will be transcribed as a merkha.
BHL has a sheva under the bet and a merkha under the ayin. BHL Appendix A has only a merkha under the bet; no sheva under the bet. BHL Appendix A has no marking under the ayin.

change.description: Move meteg from he to third lamed.
change.refuni: lamed sheva ayin vav holam lamed sheva lamed tsere yod he meteg combining-grapheme-joiner segol final-mem sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: lamed sheva ayin vav holam lamed sheva lamed tsere meteg yod he segol final-mem sof-pasuq

notes.note: The Meteg is under the third Lamed.
BHL has a meteg under the he; the meteg follows a segol. BHL Appendix A has the meteg under the third lamed; the meteg follows the tsere.

change.description: Insert rafe above bet.
change.refuni: bet sheva geresh-muqdam he qamats qof hiriq revia yod final-tsadi
change.changeuni: bet sheva geresh-muqdam he qamats qof hiriq revia yod final-tsadi

notes.note: The UXLC sometimes shows "important" rafes; usually it omits rafes. This rafe doesn't appear to be important.
BHL doesn't show rafe marks. BHL Appendix A has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change accent under ayin to meteg. Add note 'm'
change.refuni: samekh patah meteg lamed sheva ayin hiriq merkha yod
change.changeuni: samekh patah meteg lamed sheva ayin hiriq meteg yod

notes.note: The accents on the samekh and ayin are nearly identical and lack the northeast-to-southwest inclination to be transcribed as a merkha. Many texts have a merkha as the accent on the ayin.
BHL has a meteg under the samekh and merkha under the ayin. BHL Appendix A has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under the tsadi to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: tsadi dehi vav dagesh resh hiriq yod
change.changeuni: tsadi tipeha vav dagesh resh hiriq yod

notes.note: The mark under the tsadi is not prepositive; thus it will be transcribed as a tipeha.
BHL has a dehi under the tsadi. BHL Appendix A has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Consider the vowel under the qof.
change.refuni: alef segol meteg qof hataf-patah resh qamats munah alef
change.changeuni: alef segol meteg qof hataf-patah resh qamats munah alef

notes.note: The UXLC has a hataf-patah under the qof. This was set in Changes file 2023.04.01 - Changes, 2023.02.4-1, by Moshe Greenberg. Thus the transcription note 'c'.
BHL has a hataf-patah under the qof. BHL Appendix A has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from kaf.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh hiriq zarqa yod
change.changeuni: kaf hiriq zarqa yod

notes.note: A faint dot occurs within the kaf. It is probably a blemish.
BHL has a dagesh in the kaf. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the kaf.

change.description: Add maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: yod hiriq meteg he sheva yod merkha vav dagesh
change.changeuni: yod hiriq meteg he sheva yod merkha vav dagesh maqaf

notes.note: Vav and yod tops in this region of text slope downward; here the vav has a horizontal component.
BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no entry for this verse.
The exclamation mark ('!') splits the word at a previous 't' transcription note; it does not appear in the new word.

change.refuni: qof holam dehi vav segol yod final-kaf qamats
change.changeuni: qof dehi vav holam yod segol final-kaf qamats

notes.note: BHL has a holam on the qof and segol under the vav. BHL Appendix A has a holam on the vav and a segol under the yod. BHL Appendix A also has a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Remove sheva from under vav.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot qamats etnahta vav sheva alef
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot qamats etnahta vav alef

notes.note: The mark under the vav is poorly positioned for a sheva and likely an erasure or a smudge. Adjacent marks are clear and dark.
BHL has a sheva under the vav. BHL Appendix A has no sheva under the vav and a question mark.

change.description: Add dagesh in the first mem.
change.refuni: mem hiriq ole mem dagesh segol merkha nun dagesh hiriq yod
change.changeuni: mem dagesh hiriq ole mem dagesh segol merkha nun dagesh hiriq yod

notes.note: The reddish dot in the first mem is well-sized and well-positioned. This region of text is clean and doesn't show as many dots of this size and color.
BHL has no dagesh in the first mem. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Remove meteg from under dalet. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah he vav holam dalet segol meteg nun dagesh vav dagesh sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah he vav holam dalet segol nun dagesh vav dagesh sof-pasuq

notes.note: This final word has no meteg acting as a siluq.
BHL has a meteg under the dalet. BHL Appendix A has no meteg under the dalet or any other consonant.

change.description: Consider the tipeha under the kaf.
change.refuni: het hataf-patah nun qubuts kaf dagesh patah tipeha tav
change.changeuni: het hataf-patah nun qubuts kaf dagesh patah tipeha tav

notes.note: The UXLC text has a tipeha acting as a tarha under the kaf.
BHL has a tipeha under the kaf. BHL Appendix A has no comment on this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to mem.
change.refuni: mem hiriq final-nun maqaf
change.changeuni: mem dagesh hiriq final-nun maqaf

notes.note: The brownish dot in the mem is well-positioned and well-sized. This region of the text is free of such dots.
BHL has no dagesh in the mem. BHL Appendix A has a dagesh and a question mark for the mem.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: alef segol ole lamed maqaf
change.changeuni: alef segol ole lamed

notes.note: BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove meteg under zayin.
change.refuni: mem qamats meteg ayin vav dagesh zayin dagesh hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: mem qamats meteg ayin vav dagesh zayin dagesh hiriq yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: BHL has a meteg under both the mem and the zayin. BHL Appendix A has a meteg under the mem and no meteg under the zayin.

change.description: Remove sheva from under vav.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot qamats etnahta vav sheva alef
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot qamats etnahta vav alef

notes.note: BHL has a sheva under the vav. BHL Appendix A has no sheva under the vav.

change.description: Remove meteg under the bet. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav qamats bet meteg vav dagesh zayin sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: vav qamats bet vav dagesh zayin sof-pasuq

notes.note: The ascender of the lamed on the following line may be obscuring a meteg under the bet. As the last word in a verse this word should have a meteg acting as a siluq. As such, a meteg should probably be under the bet.
BHL has a meteg under the bet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move the munah from the lamed to the bet.
change.refuni: bet dagesh qamats lamed munah vav dagesh
change.changeuni: bet dagesh qamats munah lamed vav dagesh

notes.note: Because of the ascender of the lamed on the following line, no space was available to write the munah under the lamed. It was probably intended to be under the lamed.
BHL has a munah under the lamed. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move ole from tav to tsadi. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: tav dagesh hiriq ole tsadi dagesh sheva resh tsere merkha nun hiriq yod
change.changeuni: tav dagesh hiriq tsadi dagesh sheva ole resh tsere merkha nun hiriq yod

notes.note: The ole is very faded, but definitely over the tsadi.
BHL has the ole over the tsadi, not the tav. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove meteg from under the lamed. Add transcription note 'c'.
change.refuni: lamed meteg vav holam sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: lamed vav holam sof-pasuq

notes.note: The last word in the verse should have a meteg acting as a siluq.
BHL has a meteg under the lamed. BHL Appendix A has no meteg under the lamed.

change.description: Possible sheva under the dalet. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: he patah meteg mem dagesh patah gimel sheva dalet dagesh hiriq yod lamed hiriq merkha yod final-mem
change.changeuni: he patah meteg mem dagesh patah gimel sheva dalet dagesh hiriq yod lamed hiriq merkha yod final-mem

notes.note: The putative sheva under the dalet has a significantly smaller and fainter lower dot. Note the extraneous, but fainter, dot above the yod.
BHL has a hiriq under the lamed. BHL Appendix A has no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change sheva under vav to hiriq.
change.refuni: yod hiriq dehi resh sheva vav sheva yod qubuts final-nun
change.changeuni: yod hiriq dehi resh sheva vav hiriq yod qubuts final-nun

notes.note: The lower dot of the sheva under the vav in the UXLC is too faint to be transcribed as a sheva.

BHL has shevas under the resh and the vav; it has no rafe over the yod. BHL Appendix A has a hiriq under the vav; it has a rafe over the yod. BHL Appendix A agrees with the change of the sheva to hiriq under the vav and the UXLC doesn't normally display rafes.

change.description: Consider vowel under the resh. Add note 'c' for lack of meteg acting as siluq.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot qubuts resh qamats yod vav sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot qubuts resh qamats yod vav sof-pasuq

notes.note: The vowel under the resh is likely to be a qamats with a gap in its horizontal component. The word is the last in the verse and lacks a meteg acting as a siluq.
BHL has qamats then meteg under the resh. BHL Appendix A has a qamats but no meteg under the resh.

change.description: Move ole from pe to lamed.
change.refuni: vav patah meteg yod sheva pe patah ole lamed dagesh sheva tet tsere merkha final-mem
change.changeuni: vav patah meteg yod sheva pe patah lamed dagesh sheva ole tet tsere merkha final-mem

notes.note: A faint dot appears under the patah on the vav. It is not likely to be part of the text.
BHL has the ole over the lamed. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Move the meteg from under the het to under the kaf.
change.refuni: tav dagesh vav holam kaf qamats het meteg vav holam tav sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: tav dagesh vav holam kaf qamats meteg het vav holam tav sof-pasuq

notes.note: BHL has the meteg under the het. BHL Appendix A has the meteg following the qamats under the kaf.

change.description: Change meteg under the mem to tipeha.
change.refuni: mem tsere meteg het patah tet dagesh qamats alef tav hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: mem tsere tipeha het patah tet dagesh qamats alef tav hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: BHL has a tipeha (acting as a tarha) following the tsere under the mem. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Move etnahta from under the yod to under the mem.
change.refuni: yod segol he hataf-segol mem qamats yod etnahta vav dagesh final-nun
change.changeuni: yod segol he hataf-segol mem qamats etnahta yod vav dagesh final-nun

notes.note: BHL has the etnahta under the yod. BHL Appendix A has the etnahta under the mem.

change.description: Remove dagesh from qof.
change.refuni: qof dagesh hiriq vav dagesh hiriq munah yod tav hiriq yod
change.changeuni: qof hiriq vav dagesh hiriq munah yod tav hiriq yod

notes.note: The qof has a poorly-positioned, very faint dot in the qof. The four other dots in the image are dark, well-positioned and properly-sized.
BHL has no dagesh in the qof. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Move the ole from over the tav to over the het.
change.refuni: tav dagesh segol ole het hataf-segol resh patah merkha shin shin-dot
change.changeuni: tav dagesh segol het hataf-segol ole resh patah merkha shin shin-dot

notes.note: BHL has the ole over the het. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi on vav to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh dehi bet patah lamed dagesh patah yod sheva lamed qamats he
change.changeuni: vav dagesh tipeha bet patah lamed dagesh patah yod sheva lamed qamats he

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark is not prepositive and is transcribed as a tipeha.
BHL has a dehi on the vav. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change yerah-ben-yomo under the lamed to mahapakh.
change.refuni: lamed holam yerah-ben-yomo alef
change.changeuni: lamed holam mahapakh alef

notes.note: BHL has a mahapakh under the lamed. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from he.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva dehi qof hiriq resh sheva bet dagesh qamats he dagesh
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva dehi qof hiriq resh sheva bet dagesh qamats he

notes.note: The initial dehi in the LC has outstanding prepositivity!
BHL has a dagesh in the he. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the he.

change.description: Move ole over kaf to bet.
change.refuni: yod sheva meteg kaf patah ole bet dagesh sheva dalet qamats merkha nun sheva nun hiriq yod
change.changeuni: yod sheva meteg kaf patah bet dagesh sheva ole dalet qamats merkha nun sheva nun hiriq yod

notes.note: BHL has an ole over the bet. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change tipeha under second vav to merkha.
change.refuni: vav patah alef hataf-patah qof patah vav dagesh segol tipeha he
change.changeuni: vav patah alef hataf-patah qof patah vav dagesh segol merkha he

notes.note: The mark under the second vav has a slight twist to the left at the lower end making it a merkha. It certainly does not have the southeast-to-northwest inclination to be a tipeha.
The ill-formed reddish dot under the patah under the qof is probably a blemish.
BHL has a merkha under the second vav. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change meteg under pe to merkha; remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: pe dagesh qamats meteg het hataf-patah dalet vav dagesh maqaf
change.changeuni: pe dagesh qamats merkha het hataf-patah dalet vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line under the pe has a slight twist to the left at the lower end making it a merkha.
The geresh-like, northeast-to-southwest diagonal line after the vav is likely a spacer to maintain line justification.
BHL has a merkha under the pe and no maqaf at the end of the word. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Move ole over second he to yod. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: he qamats atnah-hafukh yod qamats he ole
change.changeuni: he qamats atnah-hafukh yod qamats ole he

notes.note: The ole appears between the yod and the second he. Because space is available to place the ole centered on the second he, the ole will be moved to the yod.
BHL has an ole over the yod. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Replace dehi under vav with tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh dehi mem hiriq resh sheva mem qamats he
change.changeuni: vav dagesh tipeha mem hiriq resh sheva mem qamats he

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark is not prepositive, even though space is available to write it prepositively.
BHL has a dehi under the vav. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change meteg under resh to merkha.
change.refuni: ayin dehi vav dagesh resh qamats meteg he
change.changeuni: ayin dehi vav dagesh resh qamats merkha he

notes.note: The accent under the resh is a very well inclined merkha. Its smudged background suggests that a meteg had been erased and written over.
BHL has a meteg under the resh. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Add meteg under first mem after the hiriq.
change.refuni: mem dagesh hiriq mem hiriq tav sheva qof vav holam mem sheva mem patah merkha yod
change.changeuni: mem dagesh hiriq meteg mem hiriq tav sheva qof vav holam mem sheva mem patah merkha yod

change.description: Replace dehi under the ayin with a tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: ayin dehi vav holam lamed qamats final-mem
change.changeuni: ayin tipeha vav holam lamed qamats final-mem

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available for the writer to have written the mark prepositively.
BHL has a dehi under the ayin. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change meteg under he to merkha.
change.refuni: tav dagesh sheva he meteg vav holam tav sheva tav munah vav dagesh
change.changeuni: tav dagesh sheva he merkha vav holam tav sheva tav munah vav dagesh

notes.note: BHL has a merkha under the he. BHL Appendix A has no note for this word; it has a note for word 11.

change.description: Move meteg from yod to vav.
change.refuni: he patah dalet dagesh sheva het vav dagesh yod meteg combining-grapheme-joiner qamats he sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: he patah dalet dagesh sheva het vav dagesh meteg yod qamats he sof-pasuq

notes.note: BHL has the meteg following the qamats under the yod. BHL Appendix A has the meteg under the vav; the qamats remains on the yod.

change.description: Add merkha after qamats on yod.
change.refuni: yod qamats ayin hataf-patah tsadi munah vav dagesh
change.changeuni: yod qamats merkha ayin hataf-patah tsadi munah vav dagesh

notes.note: BHL has a merkha following the qamats under the yod. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Move meteg from the second tav to under the lamed; the meteg follows the qamats on the lamed.
change.refuni: tav dagesh sheva he hiriq lamed dagesh qamats tav meteg vav holam sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: tav dagesh sheva he hiriq lamed dagesh qamats meteg tav vav holam sof-pasuq

notes.note: BHL has the meteg under the second tav. BHL Appendix A has the meteg following the qamats under the lamed.

change.description: Remove dagesh from samekh.
change.refuni: he patah samekh dagesh vav holam resh sheva resh hiriq shalshelet yod final-mem space paseq
change.changeuni: he patah samekh vav holam resh sheva resh hiriq shalshelet yod final-mem space paseq

notes.note: The slightest trace of a samekh appears at mid height inside the trailing edge of the samekh. The text in this area has additional seemingly-misplaced dots after the patah under the he and inside the resh.
BHL has a dagesh in the samekh. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the samekh.

change.description: Add maqaf between alef and resh. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: yod qamats mahapakh alef tsere merkha resh
change.changeuni: yod qamats mahapakh alef tsere merkha maqaf resh

notes.note: The word has a masora circle on it. The masora notes may explain this odd marking.
BHL has no maqaf after or in this word. BHL Appendix A has a maqaf between the alef and the resh.

change.description: Replace dehi under the mem with tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: mem dehi vav dagesh zayin qamats resh
change.changeuni: mem tipeha vav dagesh zayin qamats resh

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha under the mem is not very prepositive and will be transcribed as a tipeha.
BHL has a dehi under the mem. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Examine splotch under the kaf after the segol. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: lamed sheva bet patah bet sheva kaf segol meteg final-mem sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: lamed sheva bet patah bet sheva kaf segol meteg final-mem sof-pasuq

notes.note: The text is damaged in this region. The splotch after the segol under the kaf is probably a meteg.
BHL has a meteg under the kaf; the meteg is after the segol. BHL Appendix A has no meteg under the kaf.

change.description: Add qubuts under shin.
change.refuni: vav sheva geresh-muqdam tav hiriq pe sheva shin sin-dot revia vav dagesh he vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav sheva geresh-muqdam tav hiriq pe sheva shin sin-dot qubuts revia vav dagesh he vav dagesh

notes.note: The shin has a qubuts and the shin is followed by a vav with a dagesh (shuruq).
BHL has no qubuts under the shin. BHL Appendix A has a qubuts under the shin.

change.description: Move hiriq then etnachta from vav to he. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: yod sheva he vav hiriq etnahta he
change.changeuni: yod sheva he hiriq etnahta vav he

notes.note: The Etnahta and Hiriq appear to be under the first he.
BHL has a hiriq and then etnachta under the vav. BHL Appendix A has a hiriq and then etnachta under the he. The BHL Appendix A note has a question mark in parentheses.

change.description: Change dehi under vav to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh dehi mem tsere het qamats mem qamats samekh
change.changeuni: vav dagesh tipeha mem tsere het qamats mem qamats samekh

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark is not prepositive and will be transcribed as a tipeha. Space is available to make this mark prepositive.
BHL has a dehi under the vav. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under alef to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: alef dehi vav holam yod tsere bet
change.changeuni: alef tipeha vav holam yod tsere bet

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the alef is not prepositive. On the other hand, very little space was available to write it prepositively due to the previous word's tav and the following line's lamed ascender.
BHL has a dehi under the alef. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to nun.
change.refuni: he zarqa vav holam dalet hiriq mahapakh yod nun vav dagesh
change.changeuni: he zarqa vav holam dalet hiriq mahapakh yod nun dagesh vav dagesh

notes.note: Note: This is the first word in the verse, not the fourth word.
BHL has no dagesh in the nun. BHL Appendix A has a dagesh in the nun.

change.description: Add merkha after hiriq-then-meteg under dalet. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: tsadi patah dalet dagesh hiriq meteg yod qof sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: tsadi patah dalet dagesh hiriq meteg merkha yod qof sof-pasuq

notes.note: The meteg is imperfect, but expected. The merkha is well-positioned, well-sized, and well-shaped; it is clearer than the meteg. This is an unexpected marking.
BHL has a hiriq followed by a meteg under the dalet. BHL Appendix A has a hiriq-then-meteg-then merkha under the dalet.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: lamed sheva alef hiriq mem sheva resh tsere yod maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed sheva alef hiriq mem sheva resh tsere yod

notes.note: BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no maqaf at the end of this word.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: mem patah meteg ayin patah lamed sheva lamed tsere yod maqaf
change.changeuni: mem patah meteg ayin patah lamed sheva lamed tsere yod

notes.note: No maqaf is present between the yod at the end of this word and the alef at the start of the next word. A smudge between these consonants suggests a possible erasure.
BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Remove meteg from under the nun. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: nun tsere meteg dalet sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: nun tsere dalet sof-pasuq

notes.note: A meteg (acting as a siluq) should occur at the end of each verse.
BHL has a meteg under the nun. BHL Appendix A has no meteg under the nun.

change.description: Change dehi to tipeha under the ayin. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: ayin dehi vav holam dalet
change.changeuni: ayin tipeha vav holam dalet

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha accent under the ayin is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has dehi under the ayin. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi to merkha under zayin.
change.refuni: zayin holam dehi alef tav
change.changeuni: zayin holam merkha alef tav

notes.note: This merkha is very slightly inclined northeast-to-southwest; however, it will be transcribed as a merkha rather than a meteg.
BHL has a merkha under the zayin. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Move the ole from over the he to over the bet.
change.refuni: he hataf-segol ole bet hiriq yod alef merkha vav holam
change.changeuni: he hataf-segol bet hiriq ole yod alef merkha vav holam

notes.note: BHL has the ole over the bet. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Add dehi to tav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: tav dagesh hiriq bet sheva ayin patah merkha resh
change.changeuni: tav dagesh hiriq dehi bet sheva ayin patah merkha resh

notes.note: Under the tav a dehi appears followed by a disturbed area. The putative dehi is heavier and longer than expected; its width varies along its length. The disturbed area might contain a hiriq, a sheva, or a broken meteg. The upper diffuse dot following the dehi is probably the right, lower part of the tav; the lower diffuse dot following the dehi is probably a hiriq.

BHL has a meteg after a hiriq under the tav. BHL Appendix A gives two alternatives for the marks under the tav; both alternatives have a '?' in parentheses. One marking has a dehi followed by a hiriq; the other has a meteg before a hiriq.

change.description: Move meteg under nun to under the dalet. Remove CGJ. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah dalet holam nun meteg combining-grapheme-joiner qamats yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah dalet holam meteg nun qamats yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: This is an unexpected marking of a common word.
BHL has a qamats followed by a meteg under the nun. BHL Appendix A has a meteg under the dalet and a qamats under the nun.

change.description: Add dagesh to mem.
change.refuni: vav patah alef hataf-patah mem patah lamed sheva alef tsere meteg he vav dagesh sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: vav patah alef hataf-patah mem dagesh patah lamed sheva alef tsere meteg he vav dagesh sof-pasuq

notes.note: The putative dagesh is brownish but well-positioned and well-sized. Compare with the lower dot on the hataf-patah on the alef.
BHL has no dagesh in the mem. BHL Appendix A has a dagesh in the mem.

change.description: Add note 't' for unknown markings over yod.
change.refuni: yod sheva he ole vav qamats merkha he
change.changeuni: yod sheva he ole vav qamats merkha he

notes.note: The markings over yod do not appear to be from the previous line of text and are not understood.
BHL has a sheva on the yod, an ole over the first he, and a qamats then merkha under the vav. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under qof to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: qof holam dehi resh patah het
change.changeuni: qof holam tipeha resh patah het

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the qof is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has dehi under the qof. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Add geresh muqdam over vav.
change.refuni: vav sheva het patah yod dagesh patah revia yod
change.changeuni: vav sheva geresh-muqdam het patah yod dagesh patah revia yod

notes.note: BHL has a geresh muqdam over the vav. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Consider possible revia above the qof. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva geresh-muqdam tsadi hiriq dalet sheva qof qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia
change.changeuni: vav sheva geresh-muqdam tsadi hiriq dalet sheva qof qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia

notes.note: The putative revia is brownish and oversized. A similarly-colored, similarly-sized dot occurs in the right margin between lines 22 and 23. It is probably a defect in the paper.
BHL has no revia above the qof. BHL Appendix A has a revia above the qof.

change.description: Replace meteg under mem with merkha.
change.refuni: vav segol geresh-muqdam alef hataf-segol mem meteg vav dagesh nun qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia
change.changeuni: vav segol geresh-muqdam alef hataf-segol mem merkha vav dagesh nun qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia

notes.note: The mark under the mem has sufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be transcribed as a merkha.
BHL has a merkha under the mem. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under the mem to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: mem dehi vav holam shin shin-dot tsere lamed
change.changeuni: mem tipeha vav holam shin shin-dot tsere lamed

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the mem is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a dehi under the mem. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Move pazer from het to zayin.
change.refuni: bet sheva het qamats pazer zayin vav holam final-nun
change.changeuni: bet sheva het qamats zayin pazer vav holam final-nun

notes.note: BHL has a pazer over the zayin. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Move meteg from under the nun to under the kaf. The meteg follows the tsere. Remove CGJ.
change.refuni: lamed hiriq shin shin-dot sheva kaf tsere nun meteg combining-grapheme-joiner qamats yod vav sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: lamed hiriq shin shin-dot sheva kaf tsere meteg nun qamats yod vav sof-pasuq

notes.note: BHL has a qamats followed by meteg under the nun. BHL Appendix A has a tsere followed by meteg under the kaf and a qamats under the nun.

change.description: Change dehi under alef to tipeha.
change.refuni: alef dehi vav holam resh
change.changeuni: alef tipeha vav holam resh

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the mem is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a tipeha (acting as a tarha) under the alef. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Consider the accent under the lamed as a possible merkha.
change.refuni: lamed hiriq meteg pe sheva meteg nun tsere yod maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed hiriq meteg pe sheva meteg nun tsere yod maqaf

notes.note: The accents under the lamed and pe are nearly parallel and both have a very small inclination from the vertical. Of the two accents, the accent under the pe possibly has greater northeast-to-southwest inclination. Neither will be transcribed as a merkha.
BHL has a hiriq then meteg under the lamed and sheva then meteg under the pe. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under first vav to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh dehi shin shin-dot sheva mem vav dagesh alef tsere lamed
change.changeuni: vav dagesh tipeha shin shin-dot sheva mem vav dagesh alef tsere lamed

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the vav is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively. This is a difficult transcription because the vav is so narrow.
BHL has a dehi under the vav. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Move meteg from tav to nun. The meteg follows the qamats.
change.refuni: alef hataf-segol mem vav dagesh nun qamats tav meteg vav holam sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: alef hataf-segol mem vav dagesh nun qamats meteg tav vav holam sof-pasuq

notes.note: The nun and tav are intertwined; however, space is available to position the meteg more distinctly under the tav.
BHL has a meteg under the tav. BHL Appendix A has the meteg following the qamats under the nun.

change.description: Change hataf-patah under resh to sheva.
change.refuni: bet dagesh qamats resh hataf-patah kaf hiriq munah yod
change.changeuni: bet dagesh qamats resh sheva kaf hiriq munah yod

notes.note: No hint of a patah appears after the sheva on the resh. The ascender from the lamed on the following line would not obscure a patah of a hataf-patah.
BHL has a hataf-patah under the resh. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Change tipeha under he to dehi.
change.refuni: he tipeha vav dagesh alef
change.changeuni: he dehi vav dagesh alef

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark is sufficiently offset to the right to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a dehi under the he. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under ayin to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: ayin dehi vav holam lamed qamats final-mem
change.changeuni: ayin tipeha vav holam lamed qamats final-mem

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the mem is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a dehi under the ayin. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under he to tipeha.
change.refuni: he dehi vav holam dalet
change.changeuni: he tipeha vav holam dalet

notes.note: BHL has a tipeha under the he. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change meteg to tipeha under yod.
change.refuni: yod patah meteg ayin patah mem sheva dalet vav dagesh maqaf
change.changeuni: yod patah tipeha ayin patah mem sheva dalet vav dagesh maqaf

notes.note: The diagonal mark under the yod is thicker than expected and not of uniform width; it may be a result of a correction. The ascender of a lamed on the following line precludes positioning the tipeha immediately after the patah. Space is available, however, to write a dehi prepositively if that had been the intent.
BHL has a patah then tipeha under the yod. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Add meteg under first vav. Remove meteg under bet. Add merkha under second vav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: yod sheva shin shin-dot vav dagesh bet meteg vav dagesh final-nun sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: yod sheva shin shin-dot vav dagesh meteg bet vav dagesh merkha final-nun sof-pasuq

notes.note: The accents on this word are unexpected.
The first near-vertical line is midway between the shin and the first vav. It will be transcribed as a meteg under the first vav.
BHL has metegs under both the shin and the bet. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq shin sin-dot dagesh qamats munah alef
change.changeuni: vav patah yod hiriq shin sin-dot dagesh qamats munah alef

notes.note: BHL has a dagesh in the yod. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the yod; Ben Denckla points out that it has a strange holam between the shin and the alef that is not part of this change. BHL Appendix A agrees with this change's removal of the dagesh on the yod, however.

change.description: Change meteg under mem to merkha.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva mem patah meteg ayin patah lamed sheva lamed tsere yod he segol meteg final-mem sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva mem patah merkha ayin patah lamed sheva lamed tsere yod he segol meteg final-mem sof-pasuq

notes.note: The diagonal line under the mem has a clear northeast-to-southwest inclination and will be transcribed as a merkha.
BHL has a merkha under the mem. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Move mahapakh from resh to bet. Add meteg to resh. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: bet dagesh qamats resh mahapakh vav dagesh final-kaf sheva maqaf
change.changeuni: bet dagesh qamats mahapakh resh meteg vav dagesh final-kaf sheva maqaf

notes.note: The marking under the bet and resh is very confusing.
A mahapakh is apparent between the bet and the resh; it will be transcribed on the bet.
A nearly-vertical line appears under the resh; it will be transcribed as a meteg.
With these two understandings, an odd mark connecting the mahapakh and the meteg remains.
BHL has a qamats then mahapakh under the bet and a meteg under the resh. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change meteg to merkha under second vav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh meteg geresh-muqdam mem tsere ayin hataf-patah vav holam-haser meteg nun holam tav tsere yod he segol revia final-mem
change.changeuni: vav dagesh meteg geresh-muqdam mem tsere ayin hataf-patah vav holam-haser merkha nun holam tav tsere yod he segol revia final-mem

notes.note: A reddish dot appears under the yod. It will be considered a defect and ignored.
The revia above the he is not very dark and above its expected position.
BHL has a merkha under the second vav. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Add ole over alef.
change.refuni: alef segol ayin sheva lamed holam merkha zayin qamats he
change.changeuni: alef segol ole ayin sheva lamed holam merkha zayin qamats he

notes.note: The sheva under the ayin is smeared.
BHL has an ole over the alef. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from first vav.
change.refuni: vav dagesh geresh-muqdam tav sheva pe hiriq lamed dagesh qamats tav revia vav holam
change.changeuni: vav geresh-muqdam tav sheva pe hiriq lamed dagesh qamats tav revia vav holam

notes.note: BHL has a dagesh in the first vav. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the first vav.

change.description: Change dehi under the he to tipeha.
change.refuni: he dehi vav holam shin shin-dot hiriq yod ayin tsere munah nun hiriq yod
change.changeuni: he tipeha vav holam shin shin-dot hiriq yod ayin tsere munah nun hiriq yod

notes.note: BHL has a tipeha under the he. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under the dalet to tipeha.
change.refuni: dalet dagesh dehi vav holam resh
change.changeuni: dalet dagesh tipeha vav holam resh

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the dalet is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a tipeha under the dalet. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under kaf to tipeha.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh holam dehi lamed
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh holam tipeha lamed

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the kaf is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a tipeha under the kaf. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under kaf to tipeha.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh holam dehi lamed
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh holam tipeha lamed

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the kaf is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a tipeha under the kaf. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Add ole above alef.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh qamats atnah-hafukh alef segol resh
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh qamats atnah-hafukh alef segol ole resh

notes.note: BHL has a qamats followed by atnah-hafukh on the yod and an ole above the alef. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under lamed to tipeha.
change.refuni: lamed holam dehi alef
change.changeuni: lamed holam tipeha alef

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the kaf is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a tipeha under the lamed. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change meteg under the shin to merkha.
change.refuni: tav dagesh sheva geresh-muqdam shin shin-dot meteg vav dagesh ayin qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia
change.changeuni: tav dagesh sheva geresh-muqdam shin shin-dot merkha vav dagesh ayin qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia

notes.note: The merkha appears to have been written over a meteg.
BHL has a merkha under the shin. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Add maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: lamed sheva meteg kaf qamats lamed
change.changeuni: lamed sheva meteg kaf qamats lamed maqaf

notes.note: BHL has a maqaf at the end of the word. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Remove revia over the kaf. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh tsere geresh-muqdam revia final-nun
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh tsere geresh-muqdam final-nun

notes.note: A split geresh-muqdam is apparent over the kaf. The smeared area after it might be taken as a revia; however, the evidence is too weak to transcribe a revia over the kaf.
BHL has geresh-muqdam followed by a revia over the kaf. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Replace meteg under first tav with merkha.
change.refuni: vav sheva geresh-muqdam tav meteg vav holam resh qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia
change.changeuni: vav sheva geresh-muqdam tav merkha vav holam resh qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia

notes.note: BHL has a merkha under the first tav. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Examine strange markings through the resh and nun.
change.refuni: yod patah ayin hataf-patah zayin sheva resh qubuts meteg nun hiriq yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: yod patah ayin hataf-patah zayin sheva resh qubuts meteg nun hiriq yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: The resh and the nun are connected by a near-horizontal line which is clearly not a maqaf. The line has no textual relevance and will be ignored.
BHL has a patah under the ayin and no dagesh in the nun. BHL Appendix A has a hataf-patah under the ayin and a dagesh in the nun.

change.description: Move revia from over tav to over the kaf.
change.refuni: mem hiriq geresh-muqdam tsadi sheva vav holam-haser tav segol revia yod final-kaf qamats
change.changeuni: mem hiriq geresh-muqdam tsadi sheva vav holam-haser tav segol yod final-kaf qamats revia

notes.note: No revia is apparent over the tav. A revia is mixed with a rafe over the kaf.
BHL has a revia over the tav and has no revia over the kaf. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Add paseq (and space) at end of word. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh hiriq mahapakh yod
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh hiriq mahapakh yod space paseq

notes.note: The paseq is light and near an erasure. The UXLC adds a space before each paseq for display purposes.
BHL has no paseq at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has a paseq at the end of this word with a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Examine marking above the nun as being a qarney-para ("great pazer"). Add note 't'.
change.refuni: yod qamats nun pazer vav dagesh het patah
change.changeuni: yod qamats nun pazer vav dagesh het patah

notes.note: The accent qarney-para, "great pazer" (נ֟) is usually found only in books outside of the Sifrei Emet. The circles at the ends of the "horns" are a modern embellishment and not a factor in the decision making. The mark is likely to be a poorly written, but ordinary, pazer.
BHL has an ordinary pazer over the nun. BHL Appendix A has no note on this word in the verse. It does note word 12, however.

change.description: Remove dagesh from tsadi.
change.refuni: he patah tsadi dagesh patah dalet dagesh hiriq yod qof hiriq qadma yod final-mem
change.changeuni: he patah tsadi patah dalet dagesh hiriq yod qof hiriq qadma yod final-mem

notes.note: BHL has a dagesh in the tsadi. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the tsadi.

change.description: Change dehi under vav to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh dehi resh sheva alef tsere he
change.changeuni: vav dagesh tipeha resh sheva alef tsere he

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the kaf is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a dehi under the vav. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Examine dagesh in samekh.
change.refuni: vav sheva yod hiriq samekh dagesh holam munah gimel vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav sheva yod hiriq samekh dagesh holam munah gimel vav dagesh

notes.note: The dagesh in the samekh is small and blended in to the left side of the samekh. Its vertical position and color are an indication that it was placed as a dagesh.
BHL has a dagesh in the samekh. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to shin.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot segol yod dagesh holam resh tsere dalet zinor
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot dagesh segol yod dagesh holam resh tsere dalet zinor

notes.note: The dagesh in the shin is dark and well-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the shin. BHL Appendix A has a dagesh in the shin and a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Move ole from mem to ayin.
change.refuni: he patah meteg mem dagesh patah ole ayin hataf-patah lamed merkha vav holam tav
change.changeuni: he patah meteg mem dagesh patah ayin hataf-patah ole lamed merkha vav holam tav

notes.note: BHL has an ole over the ayin. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under vav to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh dehi mem holam pe sheva tav hiriq yod final-mem
change.changeuni: vav dagesh tipeha mem holam pe sheva tav hiriq yod final-mem

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the kaf is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a dehi under the vav. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change merkha under bet to meteg.
change.refuni: tav dagesh hiriq dalet sheva bet dagesh patah merkha qof maqaf
change.changeuni: tav dagesh hiriq dalet sheva bet dagesh patah meteg qof maqaf

notes.note: BHL has a patah then meteg under the bet. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Move ole from alef to first kaf.
change.refuni: alef segol ole zayin sheva kaf dagesh sheva resh tsere merkha kaf hiriq yod
change.changeuni: alef segol zayin sheva kaf dagesh sheva ole resh tsere merkha kaf hiriq yod

notes.note: BHL has no ole over the alef; it has an ole over the first kaf. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change patah under ayin to qamats.
change.refuni: ayin patah geresh-muqdam revia dalet
change.changeuni: ayin qamats geresh-muqdam revia dalet

notes.note: BHL has a patah under the ayin. BHL Appendix A has a qamats under the ayin and a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Change merkha under kaf to meteg. Add maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh hiriq merkha yod
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh hiriq meteg yod maqaf

notes.note: BHL has a hiriq then meteg under the kaf. BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under the alef to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: alef holam dehi yod sheva bet patah yod
change.changeuni: alef holam tipeha yod sheva bet patah yod

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the kaf is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a dehi under the alef. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh sheva meteg mem vav holam maqaf
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh sheva meteg mem vav holam

notes.note: BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

change.description: Change patah under bet to qamats. Remove meteg from under the bet.
change.refuni: bet dagesh patah meteg lamed maqaf
change.changeuni: bet dagesh qamats lamed maqaf

notes.note: BHL has only a patah under the bet. BHL Appendix A has only a qamats under the bet.

change.description: Remove dagesh from vav.
change.refuni: vav dagesh geresh-muqdam tav sheva pe hiriq lamed dagesh qamats tav hiriq revia yod
change.changeuni: vav geresh-muqdam tav sheva pe hiriq lamed dagesh qamats tav hiriq revia yod

notes.note: BHL has a dagesh in the vav. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the vav.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: yod sheva meteg dalet patah bet dagesh segol ole resh maqaf
change.changeuni: yod sheva meteg dalet patah bet dagesh segol ole resh

notes.note: BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under he to tipeha.
change.refuni: he dehi vav dagesh alef
change.changeuni: he tipeha vav dagesh alef

notes.note: The dehi/tipeha mark under the he is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a tipeha under the he. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Merge this word with the following word.
change.refuni: he patah merkha lamed sheva lamed vav dagesh space yod qamats qadma he dagesh space paseq
change.changeuni: he patah merkha lamed sheva lamed vav dagesh yod qamats qadma he dagesh space paseq

notes.note: BHL has a distinct space between the vav and the yod; it has a merkha under the initial he. BHL Appendix A has no space between the vav and the yod; it has a meteg under the initial he. BHL Appendix A agrees with this change's merger of the two words, however.

change.description: Merge this word with the following word.
change.refuni: he patah merkha lamed sheva lamed vav dagesh space yod qamats qadma he dagesh space paseq
change.changeuni: he patah merkha lamed sheva lamed vav dagesh yod qamats qadma he dagesh space paseq

notes.note: BHL has a distinct space between the vav and the yod; it has a merkha under the initial he. BHL Appendix A has no space between the vav and the yod; it has a meteg under the initial he. BHL Appendix A agrees with this change's merger of the two words, however.

change.description: Change merkha to meteg.
change.refuni: resh merkha vav dagesh het patah maqaf
change.changeuni: resh meteg vav dagesh het patah maqaf

notes.note: BHL has a meteg under the resh. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Add paseq at end of word.
change.refuni: lamed tsere munah final-kaf sheva
change.changeuni: lamed tsere munah final-kaf sheva space paseq

notes.note: For display purposes the UXLC adds a space before each paseq. This is the only instance in which a space occurs within a UXLC word.
BHL has a paseq after the kaf. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change segol under second mem to tsere.
change.refuni: mem hiriq mem dagesh segol etnahta nun dagesh qamats he
change.changeuni: mem hiriq mem dagesh tsere etnahta nun dagesh qamats he

notes.note: The evidence for the third, lower dot of a putative segol under the second mem is very slight.
BHL has a segol under the second mem. BHLA has no entry for this verse.
